name: Parodius Portable
overview: Parodius Portable is a collection of several games from the Parodius series released exclusively in Japan for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) system. Similar to Konami's other PSP compilations like Twinbee Portable (also Japan only) and Gradius Portable (known as Gradius Collection in other countries), the compilation allows players to experience classic console and arcade games in handheld format. Options include using different screen sizes for either an authentic low resolution look or scaling the games' graphics to match the PSP screen to make full use of its widescreen aspect ratio. The games included are: Parodius Da! Gokujou Parodius Sexy Parodius Jikkyou Oshaberi Parodius
